attributes.action: increase taxation on disposable sanitary products and offer incentives for women to use resuable sanitary products such as mooncups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year thousands of tonnes of landfill is created from disposable sanitary products such as tampons and sanitary towels. We petition to increase the taxation on these products and instead promote the use of reusable sanitary products such as mooncups, natural sea sponge tampons and natural product towels.
